original_text: Solomon was building his own house thirteen years, and he finished his entire house.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 자기의 왕궁을 십삼 년 동안 건축하여 그 전부를 준공하니라

sentences.original_text: Solomon was building his own house thirteen years
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬은 자기 집을 십삼 년 동안 지었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and he finished his entire house.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 자기의 온 집을 마쳤습니다.
